active.name: Thirsting Slash
active.effects: Deal {{as|175% '''base''' AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you. {{tip|Heal}} for {{as|20% AD}} {{as|(+ 8% of your '''missing''' health)}} for each enemy champion hit.
